verbose_text: GLP-1R is also expressed in many other cell types XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, including cardiomyocytes XREF_BIBR, endothelial cells XREF_BIBR etc. Recently, GLP-1 and its analogs were brought under the spotlight for their potent therapeutic potential for ischemic heart disease XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, namely myocardial ischemia / reperfusion injury XREF_BIBR and chronic heart failure secondary to myocardial infarction (MI) XREF_BIBR.
